About me

Hi there! I'm Mihai. I'm constantly learning and building cool things for the web. When I'm not at the keyboard, you'll find me struggling with the same guitar chord, hoping it finally sounds right. Let's work together!

Projects

Face Recognition App

A robust Full Stack application that detects human faces in images using AI (Clarifai API).

Backend: RESTful API built in Node.js (Express) with secure authentication (bcrypt).
Database: PostgreSQL relational database for user management and ranking.
Frontend: Responsive interface featuring user registration and real-time data updates.

See Live Front End Back End

Arduino Arcade Console

A Hardware & Embedded project built from scratch (LCD display, buttons, ATmega microcontroller).

The game logic (Car Racing, Brick Breaker) is programmed in C++, with code optimized for limited hardware memory. Demonstrates a deep understanding of the hardware-software interface.

Source Code

RoboFriends

A fast web interface that consumes data from a public API to display a list of users.

Features a real-time search functionality (search filtering) that manipulates the DOM to filter results instantly without reloading the page.
Tech: JavaScript (ES6+), API Integration, Git.

See Live Source Code
